title: Slow cooker chicken taco bowls
ingredients: ['Taco seasoning mix', '1 tablespoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '1 green pepper, cut into long slices', '1 red pepper, cut into long slices', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '500ml reduced-salt chicken stock', '2 (400g) tins black beans, rinsed']
